meanings.definition: A person who lances the bull in a bullfight.
meanings.sent1: The picadors wore traditional costumes in the bullfight.
meanings.sent2: During the bullfight, the picadors play a crucial role in the event.
meanings.sent3: The picadors decided to have a picnic instead of facing the bull.
meanings.sent4: In the arena of life, we all play the role of picadors, facing challenges head-on.
meanings.sent5: The picadors' bravery in the face of danger was truly admirable.
